analysis.description:
PixoArenaFounderToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/14/0xbdd021489de3f083e5aaa2d8cb6ba62db2902485.sol#110-111) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/14/0xbdd021489de3f083e5aaa2d8cb6ba62db2902485.sol#223-236)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/14/0xbdd021489de3f083e5aaa2d8cb6ba62db2902485.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/14/0xbdd021489de3f083e5aaa2d8cb6ba62db2902485.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/14/0xbdd021489de3f083e5aaa2d8cb6ba62db2902485.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_address' of PixoArenaFounderToken.weiToOwner (/unique_chucks/14/0xbdd021489de3f083e5aaa2d8cb6ba62db2902485.sol) is not in mixedCase
